articles.description: When asked about CEO Mark Zuckerberg, Meta's AI chatbot gave answers ranging from "I think he is a great guy" to "He's too creepy and manipulative."
articles.content:
Photo by Liu Jie/Xinhua via Getty
  • Meta unveiled its most advanced AI chatbot to date on Friday, and any US adult can talk with it.
  • But it seems the chatbot, BlenderBot 3, has some … [+2686 chars]
